response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you can acquire this exceptional product for $14,000. This price not only reflects its true worth but also ensures you secure it at an exclusive discount. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 14000}
